channel.title: Settlement Watch - Data Breach
channel.description: Legal settlements from courts and regulators - Data Breach

item.title: [$40M] Cencora/Lash Group Data Breach Settlement
item.description: Cencora and Lash Group data breach class action settlement. Up to $5,000 per claimant.

item.title: [$30M] 23andMe Data Breach Settlement
item.description: 23andMe data breach multidistrict litigation settlement. Genetic data exposure claims.

item.title: [$425M] Capital One Data Breach Class Action
item.description: Capital One data breach settlement payments ongoing. Affected customers eligible.

item.title: [$177M] AT&T Data Breach Settlement
item.description: AT&T data breach class action settlement. Deadline extended - file claims for up to $7,500.

item.title: [$1.83M] Golden Corral Data Breach Settlement
item.description: Golden Corral restaurant data breach settlement. Claims open.

item.title: [$556 Million] Google News - Kaiser Permanente settles Medicare fraud allegations...
item.description: Kaiser Settles Medicare Fraud Allegations for $556 Million. 22 hours ago. By John Tozzi.Insurer whacked with over half-a-billion settlement over fraud claims. 22 hours ago.

item.title: [$556 million] Insurer whacked with over half-a-billion settlement over ...
item.description: Jan 14, 2026 · Affiliates of Kaiser Permanente have agreed to pay $556 million to resolve allegations that they improperly boosted Medicare Advantage payments over nearly a decade by submitting invalid diagnosis...

item.title: [$46 million] Kaiser Permanente to pay $46 million in privacy data breach ...
item.description: Jan 13, 2026 · Kaiser Permanente has reached a lawsuit settlement over alleged patient data breaches involving Kaiser websites and mobile applications, with members eligible to receive a payment from a $46...

item.title: [$30M] 23andMe Data Breach Settlement: $30M Deal Covers Millions ...
item.description: Sep 16, 2024 · 23andMe has agreed to pay a “carefully tailored” $30 million settlement to resolve more than 40 class action lawsuits filed in the wake of a massive data breach last year that allegedly saw scores of users’ personal , genetic and ancestry information sold on the black market.

item.title: [$875,000] Cybersecurity in focus: DOJ aggressively investigating ...
item.description: Dec 4, 2025 · As part of the settlement , GRTC agreed to pay $875,000 to resolve allegations resulting from a whistleblower complaint that it failed to meet the cybersecurity requirements in its DoD contracts.

item.title: [$1.25M] Penn State Agrees to Pay $1.25M in Settlement for ...
item.description: Nov 12, 2024 · On Tuesday, October 22, 2024, Pennsylvania State University (“Penn State”) reached a settlement with the Department of Justice (“DoJ”), agreeing to pay the US Government (“USG”) $1.25M for alleged cybersecurity compliance violations under the False Claims Act (“FCA”).

item.title: Cyber Whistleblower Leads to DOJ Civil Settlement
item.description: Nov 21, 2024 · This is the latest settlement of cybersecurity -related FCA claims since DOJ announced its Civil Cyber-Fraud Initiative in October 2021. The case stems from a complaint filed in the Eastern District of Pennsylvania by Penn State’s Chief Information Officer (“CIO”).

item.title: DOJ Cyber-Fraud Initiative: FCA Settlement Highlights Compliance
item.description: May 31, 2025 · The settlement agreement revealed additional details regarding the cybersecurity issues underlying this matter.

item.title: [$7,500] AT&T data breach settlement : deadline in 2 weeks to claim $7,500
item.description: Two settlement classes are eligible to file a claim : customers who were affected by the March 2024 cyberattack and those who were affected by the July 2024 data breach .What is the deadline to submit a claim for the AT&T settlement ?

item.title: AT&T data breach settlement claim deadline nears. How to file yours.
item.description: How to claim your AT&T settlement money. According to the settlement website, affected customers now have until Dec. 18 to claim their cut — impacted users should have already received a settlement notice containing a Class Member ID or will receive notice by Oct.

item.title: The AT&T data breach settlement deadline is almost here.
item.description: An even larger data breach was uncovered in late 2024. This second breach exposed the telephone numbers and records of calls and texts of nearly every AT&T customer, and took place between approximately May 1 and Oct.

item.title: [$177 Million] AT&T $177 Million Data Breach Class Action Settlement
item.description: Update: The AT&T data breach settlement claim deadline has been extended to Dec.How much is the data breach payout? The amount a class member can receive depends on which class they are in and the type of claim they file.

item.title: Cencora Data Security Incident Settlement (2025) How... - YouTube
item.description: In this informative video, we delve into the recent data security incident involving Cencora and what it means for you.

item.title: [$4.7M] Dominion National Data Breach $4.7M Class Action Settlement
item.description: Claims Administrator. Dominion National Security Incident Settlement 1650 Arch Street, Suite 2210 Philadelphia, PA 19102 [email protected] 833-771-1363. Class Counsel.

item.title: What is the Cencora Data Security Incident ? See if you quality for...
item.description: The deadline to file a claim for the Cencora Data Security Incident Settlement is Monday, Jan. 19, 2026, either by submitting an online Claim Form or mailed to the Settlement Administrator.

item.title: [$40M] Cencora and The Lash Group $40M Data Breach Settlement
item.description: Settlement administrator's mailing address: Cencora Data Security Incident Settlement Administrator, c/o Kroll Settlement Administration LLC, P.O. Box 225391 New York, NY...

item.title: [$177 million] AT&T Class Action Lawsuit Sending $7,500 Settlement Checks ...
item.description: Jan 6, 2026 · AT&T agreed to pay $177 million to settle class action lawsuits over two separate 2024 data breaches that exposed personal information of approximately 73 million current and former customers.

item.title: AT&T Data Breach Settlement (2026): Who Qualifies, Claims ...
item.description: 6 days ago · In simple terms, AT&T agreed to a settlement because customers claimed the leaks exposed their private information and created financial risk. The settlement now sets up a process where eligible people can file claims for reimbursement if they can document losses that connect to the breach .

item.title: [$177 million] AT&T settlement payout timeline update 2026: Claim up to ...
item.description: Jan 26, 2026 · AT&T customers are nearing payouts from a $177 million data breach settlement . A federal judge held the final approval hearing on January 15, 2026 . Eligible users can receive up to $7,500 for proven financial losses. Most payments will likely be smaller pro rata shares.

item.title: [$177M] AT&T $177M Data Breach Settlement: Up to $7,500 Per Person
item.description: Jan 31, 2026 · AT&T's $177 million data breach settlement could pay up to $7,500 per person. The claim deadline has passed but court-approved payouts are expected by spring 2026 .

item.title: [$177M] AT&T to Pay $177M Settlement for 2024 Data Breaches; Claims ...
item.description: AT&T's $177M settlement for its 2024 SSN and call record breaches highlights the massive, long-tail cost of data theft. This is a critical lesson in financial risk modeling for all organizations.

item.title: [$177 million] Deadline extended to file a claim in AT&T data breach ...
item.description: Dec 2, 2025 · The deadline to file a claim for money from the $177 million AT&T class action settlement is coming up.

item.title: [$117.5M] Comcast $117.5M Data Breach Class Action Settlement ...
item.description: The final approval hearing is scheduled for July 7, 2026 . The judge will decide whether to grant final approval and award attorneys’ fees. If approved and no appeals are filed, payments typically begin 60 to 90 days later—likely October or November 2026 .
